game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Your mission is to travel to the Icewind Dale and recover the lost artifact rumored to be hidden in the depths of Ice Cave.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and an epic weapon

task.description: Equip yourself with warm clothing and necessary equipment to survive the harsh cold of Icewind Dale.
Beware of the Ice Trolls guarding the entrance of the cave. You may need to defeat them to enter the cave.

task.objective: Find and recover the Lost artifact
task.description: Use the map given by the king to navigate through the cave and find the artifact. Expect resistance from the creatures lurking within.
